div.p: In the reign of Ptolemy, god Philometor, year n, and the rest of the customary formulas as written in Alexandria, in the month of Panemos and Pachon 19, in the city of the Oxyrhynchi of the Thebaid. […]krates son of Aris[… (verb) (to) …] and (to) Thatres […] Translation: N. Gonis, APF 62 (2016) 110
